snippet: David Tovar, vice president of corporate communications, said Walmart discovered he hadn’t graduated from college during a background check in preparation for promoting him.
abstract: David Tovar, Walmart's vice president for corporate communications, is forced to resign after it is discovered that he had lied about receiving art degree from University of Delaware; Tovar attended institution for four years, but fell few credits short of graduating.
lead_paragraph: David Tovar, vice president of corporate communications, said Walmart discovered he hadn’t graduated from college during a background check in preparation for promoting him.

headline.main: Walmart Vice President Forced Out for Lying About Degree
headline.print_headline: Walmart Vice President Forced Out for Lying About Degree
